attributes.action: Declare unequivocal support for Israel as long as Hamas keeps throwing rockets from Gaza into Israel.
attributes.additional_details: Everybody on the planet knows that the muslim Hamas organisation has no concerns over the civilian lives being lost because it sites and stores rockets in tunnels under schools, hospitals and residential streets.  As long as Hamas keeps throwing up rockets, Israel MUST be supported by western civilisations as the only non-muslim country taking the necessary and appropriate action against islamic fundamentalist terrorism
